articles.author: Lenny Bernstein
articles.title: Black man awaiting kidney transplant alleges racial bias - The Washington Post
articles.description: Los Angeles barber says in a lawsuit that African Americans rank lower on organ wait lists because of a flawed algorithm.
articles.content:

An African American man is seeking millions of dollars in damages and a better position on the kidney transplant waiting list in a lawsuit that claims an algorithm use… [+6248 chars]
